title: Heads Up—The Best Amazon Sneakers Will Be Discounted During the Big Spring Sale
description: When did Amazon’s sneaker section get so good?
excerpt: Our shopping experts predict many of these Amazon sneakers will be on sale during the Amazon Big Spring Sale 2025. Shop deals on Adidas, Puma, Veja, and more.
text: A Pop of ColorAdidas Vl Court 3.0 SneakerBrightly colored suede sneakers have emerged as a seasonal standout. These cheery yellow Adidas give a Samba vibe without being quite so on the nose. html:
A Pop of Color

Adidas Vl Court 3.0 Sneaker

Brightly colored suede sneakers have emerged as a seasonal standout. These cheery yellow Adidas give a Samba vibe without being quite so on the nose.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 62 options

Materials: Suede or leather

Customer review: “These shoes are a complete winner. They are extremely comfortable and versatile... Considering how many ways I can wear these and can dress them up or down, I think they are a great value.”

A Hot Girl Walking Shoe

Ryka Devotion X Max Sneaker

The Ryka Devotion X Max provides the same arch and ankle support as orthopedic shoes, but it looks much more stylish during your hot girl walks.

Sizes: 5-12 (also available in wide)

Colors: Salsa, Silver, Sky Grey, Tapioca Beige, Dusk Blue

Materials: Suede and textile

Customer review: “So comfortable...I feel like I’m propelled forward, so it’s so comfortable to walk all day.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Timeless Tennis Shoe

Reebok Club C 85 Vintage Sneaker

Crafted for comfort, these retro Reebok sneakers make a wise choice for an everyday white sneaker. The popular Club C silhouette also comes in a platform style that’s a personal favorite of associate fashion commerce editor Meg Donohue.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Chalk

Materials: Leather

Customer review:“I cannot say enough good things about these shoes. I wear them almost daily, and they’re still holding up, 2 years later.”

An Easy Office Sneaker

Puma Club 5V5 Sneaker

After an office sneaker? Thanks to a sleek, soccer-inspired silhouette, these low-top Pumas pair just as well with workday trousers as they do with weekend sundresses.

Sizes: 5.5-11

Colors: Warm White, Island Pink, White/Black, Rose Quartz

Material: Leather

Customer review: “They are well made... and have a comfortable memory foam interior. I wear them on days when I don't want to look like I am heading to the gym.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Sleek Soccer Shoe

Veja Volley Sneaker

Low-profile soccer shoes remain a key sneaker silhouette for spring/summer 2025. This understated pair from Veja offers a refreshing alternative to Sambas.

Sizes: 5-10

Colors: White, Metallic Silver, Egee Sun Blue

Materials: Leather or suede

Customer review: “Super comfortable and super stylish... great value for the money.”

A Popular Workout Sneaker

Brooks Anthem 6 Running Shoe

Well-cushioned workout sneakers aren’t always the cutest. But these monochrome Brooks are the sort you’ll want to stay in long after you leave the gym.

Sizes: 6-12

Colors: Coconut/Portabella, Ebony/Lavender, Blackened Pearl/Pink

Materials: Mesh

Customer review: “I find these Brooks absolutely the most comfortable walking shoes I have ever worn.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Spring Pastel

Coach Soho Sneaker

Welcome spring with a pastel sneaker that’ll make your basic tees and jeans feel fresh. This low-top basketball silhouette is one cool girls keep coming back to again and again.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 9 options

Materials: Leather

Customer review: “They’re so well made. I can already tell they’ll last for years to come.”

A Suede Fabrication

Vince Oasis Sneaker

Suede sneakers—and suede accessories at large—are all the rage this season. Offered in nubby-textured neutral hues, these Vince Oasis sneakers put a sophisticated spin on the trending material.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 11 options

Materials: Suede or leather

Customer review: “These are the most comfortable sneakers I’ve ever worn.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Shoe Offering All-Day Comfort

New Balance 574 Core Sneaker

New Balance’s 574 sneakers are the type that never truly falls out of style. The cushioned dad shoes provide all-day comfort and pair just as well with baggy jeans as they do with athleisure sets.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Black, Grey, Navy, Burgundy, Dusk Shower

Materials: Suede

Customer review: “Go great with just about every outfit. Whenever I'm unsure what shoes to wear, I pick these.”

A Designer Fashion Find

Tory Burch Good Luck Trainer

Tory Burch’s Good Luck trainers give a lesson in casual sophistication. They’re laid-back enough for sweatpants and workout leggings but not too sporty for in-office wear.

Sizes: 4-12

Colors: Bianco

Materials: Suede and textile

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Childhood Favorite

Keds Champion Lace Up Sneaker

Why not revisit your youth with a pair of classic Keds Champion sneakers? You can snag them on Amazon for under $60.

Sizes: 4-13 (available in narrow, wide, and extra wide)

Colors: 23 options

Material: Canvas

Customer review: “They fit perfectly. I didn’t even have to break them in, and they never stretched out from all the wear.”

A Responsive Runner

New Balance Fresh Foam 680 V8 Running Shoe

A fresh pair of running shoes is just what you need to stick to your marathon training schedule this spring—or perhaps just the motivation you need to take the occasional jog around the block.

Sizes: 5-12 (also available in wide)

Colors: Black, Angora, Quarry Blue, Sunfade Red, White

Materials: Textile

Customer review: “They have a comfortable toe box and provide great cushioning for my arches and heels. Unlike most shoes, they weren’t stiff and didn’t need to be broken in.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

An Emerging Color Trend

Lacoste L003 Neo Sneaker

Pistachio green is quickly becoming one of the season’s most popular shades. These sporty Lacoste sneakers offer a practical way to test-drive the budding color trend.

Sizes: 5-10

Colors: 16 options

Materials: Leather, suede, and textile

Customer review: “I love how these shoes effortlessly elevate my outfit. It's a plus that they're very comfy.”

A Colorful Workout Sneaker

Asics Gel-Nimbus 27 Running Shoe

Asics Gel-Nimbus 27 running shoes can really put in the miles—and look good while doing it. Reviewers rave that the thick foam sole is just as comfortable and supportive as it appears.

Sizes: 5-13

Colors: 15 options

Material: Textile

Customer review: “Very comfortable... if you need to stand on your feet all day, you will love these shoes.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

An Eyecatching Metallic

Rag & Bone Retro Runner Slim Sneakers

Feeling a bit bored with your current sneaker options? Reenergize your footwear selection with these sleek metallic sneakers from Rag & Bone.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Silver

Materials: Textile and leather

A Euro Summer Shoe

Superga 2750 Cotu Classic Sneakers

Worn by Kate Middleton and countless European holiday-goers, these classic Superga 2750 Cotu sneakers will bring a laid-back vibe to all your summer looks.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 26 options

Material: Canvas

Customer review: “Walked 49 miles through Italy with no blisters. Comfortable and stylish. Highly recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Hint of Leopard Print

Adidas Run 72 Sneaker

Leopard print is no longer reserved for mob wife coats. This spring, you’ll see it covering everything from baggy jeans to retro sneakers like these Adidas runners.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 21 options

Materials: Textile and suede

Customer review: “So comfortable straight out of the box... The arch support is excellent.”

A Machine-Washable Option

Rothy's The Lace Up Sneaker

If you struggle to keep your light-colored sneakers clean, try this machine-washable fan favorite from Rothy’s. It’s comfortable enough for all-day wear and versatile enough to go with almost anything in your closet.

Sizes: 5-13

Colors: Black, white, blonde

Material: Textile

Customer review: “I couldn’t believe how comfortable they were right out of the box. Just amazing!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

An Elevated White Sneaker

Kate Spade New York K as in Kate Sneaker

These chic Kate Spade runners have a hidden secret: an invisible 1-inch heel that provides a little lift. The textured gum sole adds a special little something to the otherwise simple silhouette.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: True White, Brown Multi

Material: Leather and mesh

Customer review: “Really cushy and comfortable. And, of course, beautiful, as well!”

A Laid-Back Look

Gola Grandslam Trident Sneakers

These Gola sneakers have a retro quality that gives off an easygoing vibe. The laid-back silhouette will go with just about any casual outfit you throw on.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: 26 options

Material: Faux leather and suede

Customer review: “The perfect sneaker... true to size, and the colors are even better in real life.”
